/*
:name: 22.5.1--define_expansion_9
:description: Test
:tags: 22.5.1
:type: preprocessing
*/
`define MACRO1(a=5,b="B",c) initial $display(a,,b,,c);
module top ();
`MACRO1 ( , 2, 3 )
endmodule

----

  (comment)

      (simple_identifier))
    (macro_text))

      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (list_of_ports))
    (module_item
      (text_macro_usage
        (simple_identifier)

            (param_expression
              (mintypmax_expression
                (expression

                    (primary_literal
                      (integral_number
